This is a WIP list of traits translated form the Perfect Guide

Breed Traits
TraitBenefit
Hi Power Improved STR gain
Hi Sense Improved INT Gain
Hi Technique Improved SKI Gain
Hi Speed Improved SPD Gain
Hi Toughness Improved DEF Gain
Hi Energy Improved LIFE Gain
Charisma Less Stress from training
Iron Heart Less fatigue from training
Glass Heart
Elite
Indomitable Spirit
